title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to pull, create, and run large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library that wraps Ollama’s REST API for chatting, generating, and managing models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration enabling Ollama models as LLM, chat, and embedding providers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, and RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM library for integrating Ollama models into Spring Boot, Android, and Kotlin projects.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models onto Kubernetes clusters with GPU support.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app using Vite and the official ollama-js client for quick local prototyping.

title: ollama-cli-tools
summary: Collection of shell scripts for batch pulling, tagging, and converting models into Ollama Modfile format.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of ready-to-use Ollama Modfiles for niche domains like medicine, law, and finance.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers query local Ollama models with slash commands and moderation.

title: ollama-rag
summary: FastAPI service combining Ollama LLMs with Chroma vector store for retrieval-augmented generation.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module that pipelines Ollama model creation, testing, and container publishing in CI.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app for chatting with Ollama models privately or in channels with thread support.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that connects to Ollama and supports voice input via browser API.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible Ollama binaries and development shells for macOS and Linux.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir client library leveraging Finch for HTTP and GenServer for streaming Ollama completions.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for offline AI-assisted note summarization and Q&A using local Ollama models.
